fields.description: Feedback Addon allows to display feedback based on function call from other Module. You can display text, formulas, images and anything else that you can embed in HTML.   You can define indefinite amount of Feedback Responses. Each of them has to be described by Unique Identifier and Status (True, False or Neutral). Unique Identifier is used to distinguish between particular responses, Status is used to apply different styles to responses that indicate positive, neutral or negative feedback.

fields.description: This lesson focuses on transformations of points and figures including reflections rotations, translations, and combined transformations. Students begin with mirror symmetry and identifying lines of symmetry. They then reflect points and figures, and play a symmetry game. Next, students rotate points and figures about a center of rotation in a grid. Finally, they perform translations of points and combine multiple transformations.
fields.title: LEA-2420
fields.tags: symmetry, reflection, transformation, translation, rotation, transformations, image, line of symmetry, line symmetry, symmetry with respect to a line, point symmetry, symmetry with respect to a point, translating points, center of rotation, rotation in coordinate grid, combining transformations

fields.description: This lesson focuses on written calculations. Students begin with some practice in mental math and then extend calculations with counting numbers to adding, subtracting, multiplying, and dividing whole numbers greater than 100, as well as to decimals.
fields.title: LEA-2431
fields.tags: solving, problems, numbers, multiplying, dividing, decimal, adding, subtracting, mental, written, arithmetic, writing, mental math, calculating, solving arithmetic problems with writing

fields.description: This lesson focuses on comparing two sets of data using measures of central tendency and range. Students begin by comparing means in a double bar graph, and finding measures of central tendency for two groups of students from bar graphs. They also compare the two sets of data using the range. Students draw a double bar graph and compare the mean and range for two sets of data.
fields.title: [LEA-2222] Comparing Two Sets of Data
fields.tags: data, statistics, mean, range, mode, median, comparing, using, two, Distribution, compare, central tendency, double bar graphs, sets, comparing two sets of data

fields.description: At the end of this activity, students should be able to: 2013 explain how the Earth's atmosphere evolved before reaching its present composition 2013 describe the approximate percentage composition of the atmosphere at present 2013 discuss the structure of the atmosphere 2013 describe the process of formation of radicals by the break-up of a covalent bond 2013 explain how chlorine radicals can deplete the ozone layer 2013 explain the effect of the ozone-hole expansion on human health 2013 explain how the ozone layer is formed 2013 describe the causes of the greenhouse effect, and what impact it could have on the living conditions on Earth.
fields.title: [LEA-2018] The Atmosphere
fields.tags: atmosphere, layer, ozone, radical, layers, stratosphere, the atmosphere

fields.description: This lesson focuses on polygons and their properties. Students begin by classifying and drawing triangles by side length and angle measures. They examine whether it is possible to build a triangle of given side lengths. Next, students examine quadrilaterals including squares, rectangles, rhombuses, trapezoids, and kites. Students differentiate between regular and irregular polygons and recognize polygons with reflectional and rotational symmetry.
fields.title: [LEA-2246] Properties of Polygons
fields.tags: shape, triangle, quadrilateral, polygon, symmetry, reflection, properties, rotation, polygons, reflectional symmetry, rotational symmetry, classifying triangles, regular polygon, irregular polygon, properties of polygons, of

fields.title: [LEA-2246] Image Viewer Demo Presentation
fields.tags: image, presentation, viewer, addon, demo

fields.description: This lesson focuses on the area of polygons. Students reviews finding the area of rectangles and extends this to finding the area of any parallelogram. They then draw parallelograms and find the side lengths given information about the area. Next, students find the area of irregular figures that can be divided into parallelograms. They then solve triangle area problems and calculate the areas of various polygons including trapezoids.
fields.title: [LEA-2491] #1 Math module (Areas of Polygons)
fields.tags: polygons, areas, areas of polygons, flag, area of polygon, area of rectangle, area of parallelogram, area of triangle, area of trapezoid, area of irregular figures

fields.description: This lesson focuses on comparing and ordering decimals. Students begin by identifying the greater or smaller decimal for length measurements. They then complete pairs of related inequality statements. Students then use number lines to compare, order, and plot both positive and negative decimals.
fields.title: [LEA-2491] #2 Math module (Comparing and Ordering Decimals)
fields.tags: decimal , ordering , decimals , negative , length , comparing , inequality , positive , order , plot , compare , comparing and ordering decimals , number line

fields.description: At the end of this activity, students should be able to explain the significance of thermal insulation, describe an adiabatic transition, state the adiabatic equation, describe the difference between an adiabatic transition and an isothermal transition and name some examples of natural phenomena and technical processes in which we encounter an adiabatic transition.
fields.title: [LEA-2505] Adiabatic Transition
fields.tags: heat,  engine,  Transition,  thermal,  adiabatic,  isotherm,  Adiabatic transition

fields.description: This lesson focuses on surveys and survey data. It begins with a problem, and then shows the process of finding the answer, including planning survey questions, collecting data, and drawing conclusions. Students work with four kinds of survey questions, and apply the process presented to a real-world situation.
fields.title: [LEA-2496] Working with Surveys and Survey Data
fields.tags: data, working, survey, organizing data, collecting data, observations, drawing conclusions, presenting data, planning questions, kinds of survey questions, yes/no question, open question, multiple choice question, question that asks for a number, surveys, working with surveys and survey data

fields.description: This lesson explores the similarities and differences between animal and plant cells. Students will learn about the cell membrane, cytoplasm, and nucleus in both animal and plant cells. They will also explore the functions of chloroplasts and cell walls in plant cells and specialized animal cells. The lesson also details levels of organization, including the way animal and plant cells form tissues, tissues form organs, and organ systems form the complex levels of organization in the human body.   http://www.math-and-science.com/content.php/lesson/content/amoeba_cell_membrane_cellulose_chlorophyll_chloroplasts_cytoplasm_nucleus_photosynthesis_sap_vacuole.html
fields.title: [LEA-2517] C00e9lulas animais e vegetais
fields.tags: cell membrane, cellulose, chlorophyll, cytoplasm, nucleus, photosynthesis, vacuole, animal, plant, cells, animal and plant cells, red blood cell, nerve cell, organ and chloroplast, animal cell, plant cell, cell wall, tissue, levels of organization, specialized cells, cellular function, organ systems, cell components, organism, white blood cell

fields.description: Feedback Addon allows to display feedback based on function call from other Module. You can display text, formulas, images and anything else that you can embed in HTML.   You can define indefinite amount of Feedback Responses. Each of them has to be described by Unique Identifier and Status (True, False or Neutral). Unique Identifier is used to distinguish between particular responses, Status is used to apply different styles to responses that indicate positive, neutral or negative feedback.

fields.title: LEA-2398
fields.tags: difference, (1), functions, angles, sum, tangent, trigonometric, sine, cosine, identities, Trigonometric functions of the sum and difference of angles (1)

fields.description: This lesson focuses on transformations of points and figures including reflections rotations, translations, and combined transformations. Students begin with mirror symmetry and identifying lines of symmetry. They then reflect points and figures, and play a symmetry game. Next, students rotate points and figures about a center of rotation in a grid. Finally, they perform translations of points and combine multiple transformations.
fields.title: LEA-2420
fields.tags: symmetry, reflection, transformation, translation, rotation, transformations, image, line of symmetry, line symmetry, symmetry with respect to a line, point symmetry, symmetry with respect to a point, translating points, center of rotation, rotation in coordinate grid, combining transformations

fields.description: This lesson focuses on written calculations. Students begin with some practice in mental math and then extend calculations with counting numbers to adding, subtracting, multiplying, and dividing whole numbers greater than 100, as well as to decimals.
fields.title: LEA-2431
fields.tags: solving, problems, numbers, multiplying, dividing, decimal, adding, subtracting, mental, written, arithmetic, writing, mental math, calculating, solving arithmetic problems with writing

fields.description: This lesson focuses on comparing two sets of data using measures of central tendency and range. Students begin by comparing means in a double bar graph, and finding measures of central tendency for two groups of students from bar graphs. They also compare the two sets of data using the range. Students draw a double bar graph and compare the mean and range for two sets of data.
fields.title: [LEA-2222] Comparing Two Sets of Data
fields.tags: data, statistics, mean, range, mode, median, comparing, using, two, Distribution, compare, central tendency, double bar graphs, sets, comparing two sets of data

fields.description: At the end of this activity, students should be able to: 2013 explain how the Earth's atmosphere evolved before reaching its present composition 2013 describe the approximate percentage composition of the atmosphere at present 2013 discuss the structure of the atmosphere 2013 describe the process of formation of radicals by the break-up of a covalent bond 2013 explain how chlorine radicals can deplete the ozone layer 2013 explain the effect of the ozone-hole expansion on human health 2013 explain how the ozone layer is formed 2013 describe the causes of the greenhouse effect, and what impact it could have on the living conditions on Earth.
fields.title: [LEA-2018] The Atmosphere
fields.tags: atmosphere, layer, ozone, radical, layers, stratosphere, the atmosphere

fields.tags: 7th grade, ccs, algebra

fields.description: This lesson focuses on polygons and their properties. Students begin by classifying and drawing triangles by side length and angle measures. They examine whether it is possible to build a triangle of given side lengths. Next, students examine quadrilaterals including squares, rectangles, rhombuses, trapezoids, and kites. Students differentiate between regular and irregular polygons and recognize polygons with reflectional and rotational symmetry.
fields.title: [LEA-2246] Properties of Polygons
fields.tags: shape, triangle, quadrilateral, polygon, symmetry, reflection, properties, rotation, polygons, reflectional symmetry, rotational symmetry, classifying triangles, regular polygon, irregular polygon, properties of polygons, of

fields.title: [LEA-2246] Image Viewer Demo Presentation
fields.tags: image, presentation, viewer, addon, demo

fields.description: This lesson focuses on the area of polygons. Students reviews finding the area of rectangles and extends this to finding the area of any parallelogram. They then draw parallelograms and find the side lengths given information about the area. Next, students find the area of irregular figures that can be divided into parallelograms. They then solve triangle area problems and calculate the areas of various polygons including trapezoids.
fields.title: [LEA-2491] #1 Math module (Areas of Polygons)
fields.tags: polygons, areas, areas of polygons, flag, area of polygon, area of rectangle, area of parallelogram, area of triangle, area of trapezoid, area of irregular figures

fields.description: This lesson focuses on comparing and ordering decimals. Students begin by identifying the greater or smaller decimal for length measurements. They then complete pairs of related inequality statements. Students then use number lines to compare, order, and plot both positive and negative decimals.
fields.title: [LEA-2491] #2 Math module (Comparing and Ordering Decimals)
fields.tags: decimal , ordering , decimals , negative , length , comparing , inequality , positive , order , plot , compare , comparing and ordering decimals , number line

fields.description: At the end of this activity, students should be able to explain the significance of thermal insulation, describe an adiabatic transition, state the adiabatic equation, describe the difference between an adiabatic transition and an isothermal transition and name some examples of natural phenomena and technical processes in which we encounter an adiabatic transition.
fields.title: [LEA-2505] Adiabatic Transition
fields.tags: heat,  engine,  Transition,  thermal,  adiabatic,  isotherm,  Adiabatic transition

fields.description: This lesson focuses on surveys and survey data. It begins with a problem, and then shows the process of finding the answer, including planning survey questions, collecting data, and drawing conclusions. Students work with four kinds of survey questions, and apply the process presented to a real-world situation.
fields.title: [LEA-2496] Working with Surveys and Survey Data
fields.tags: data, working, survey, organizing data, collecting data, observations, drawing conclusions, presenting data, planning questions, kinds of survey questions, yes/no question, open question, multiple choice question, question that asks for a number, surveys, working with surveys and survey data

fields.description: This lesson explores the similarities and differences between animal and plant cells. Students will learn about the cell membrane, cytoplasm, and nucleus in both animal and plant cells. They will also explore the functions of chloroplasts and cell walls in plant cells and specialized animal cells. The lesson also details levels of organization, including the way animal and plant cells form tissues, tissues form organs, and organ systems form the complex levels of organization in the human body.   http://www.math-and-science.com/content.php/lesson/content/amoeba_cell_membrane_cellulose_chlorophyll_chloroplasts_cytoplasm_nucleus_photosynthesis_sap_vacuole.html
fields.title: [LEA-2517] C00e9lulas animais e vegetais
fields.tags: cell membrane, cellulose, chlorophyll, cytoplasm, nucleus, photosynthesis, vacuole, animal, plant, cells, animal and plant cells, red blood cell, nerve cell, organ and chloroplast, animal cell, plant cell, cell wall, tissue, levels of organization, specialized cells, cellular function, organ systems, cell components, organism, white blood cell

    background-position: left center;

    border-bottom: 2px solid #d1cfcf;

}

}

/* buttons */.ic_button_check {
                 clip:rect(0px, 50px, 50px, 0px);
                 background-position: 0px 0px;
                 overflow: hidden;
                 /*background: url('/file/serve/9235');
*/  background: url('/file/serve/9235');
             }

.ic_button_check-up-hovering {
    background-position: 0px -50px;
}

.ic_button_check-down-hovering {
    background-position: 0px -100px;
}

.ic_button_uncheck {
    clip:rect(0px, 50px, 50px, 0px);
    background-position: 0px -150px;
    overflow: hidden;
    background-image:url('/file/serve/9235');
}

.ic_button_uncheck-up-hovering {
    background-position: 0px -200px;
}

.ic_button_check-down-hovering {
    background-position: 0px -250px;
}

.ic_button_reset {
    clip:rect(0px, 50px, 50px, 0px);
    background-position: 0px 0px;
    overflow: hidden;
    background: url('/file/serve/9236');
}

.ic_button_reset-up-hovering {
    background-position: 0px -50px;
}

.ic_button_reset-down-hovering {
    background-position: 0px -100px;
}

.ic_button_nextpage {
    clip:rect(0px, 50px, 50px, 0px);
    background-position: 0px 0px;
    overflow: hidden;
    background: url('/file/serve/9237');
}

.ic_button_nextpage-up-hovering {
    background-position: 0px -50px;
}

.ic_button_nextpage-down-hovering {
    background-position: 0px -100px;
}

.ic_button_prevpage {
    clip:rect(0px, 50px, 50px, 0px);
    background-position: 0px 0px;
    overflow: hidden;
    background: url('/file/serve/9238');
}

.ic_button_prevpage-up-hovering {

.ic_button_prevpage-down-hovering {
    background-position: 0px -100px;
}

.ic_option-neutral {
    padding-left: 19px;
}

.ic_option-wrong {
    padding-left: 19px;
    background-image: url('/file/serve/9239');
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

.ic_option-correct {
    background-image: url('/file/serve/9240');
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    padding-left: 19px;
}

.ic_report {
    padding: 15px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    border: 1px solid gray;
    background-color:white;
    font-size: 16px;
    color:gray;
}

.ic_report td {
    color:gray;
    font-size: 16px;
    padding: 10px;
}

.ic_report-header td {
    font-weight: bold;
    color: black;
}

.ic_report-odd {
    background-color: #f5f6f6;
}

.ic_report-even {
    background-color: #edefef;
}

.ic_report .ic_progress {
    border-radius: 4px;
    border: 2px solid #02789f;
    padding: 2px;
}

.ic_report .ic_progress-bar {
    background-color: #3cc5cc;
    border-radius: 4px;
}

.ic_report .ic_progress-text {
    line-height: 23px;
    font-family: Arial;
    font-size: 18px;
    color: #02789f;
}

.ic_report-footer {
    font-weight: bold;
    color: black;
}

/*--- animation ---*/.animationFrame {
                         border: 1px solid #CCCCCC;
                         padding: 2px;
                         background-color: transparent;
                     }

.animationFrame .animation-watermark {
    display: block;
    height: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%;
}

.animationFrame .animation-watermark canvas {
    display: inline;
    height: 100px;
    width: 100px;
    margin-top: -50px;
    position: relative;
    top: 50%;
}

/*--- animation small---*/	.animationFrame-small {
                                  border: 1px solid #CCCCCC;
                                  padding: 2px;
                                  background-color: #ffffff;
                              }

.animationFrame-small .animation-watermark {
    display: block;
    height: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%;
}

.animationFrame-small .animation-watermark canvas {
    display: inline;
    height: 40px;
    width: 40px;
    margin-top: -20px !important;
    position: relative;
    top: 50%;
}

/*--- animation empty---*/			.animation_empty {
                                          cursor: pointer;
                                          background-color: transparent;
                                          padding: 0 !important;
                                          border: 0 !important;
                                      }

.animation_empty .animation-watermark {
    height: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%;
}

.animation_empty .animation-watermark canvas {
    display: inline;
    height: 100px;
    width: 100px;
    margin-top: -50px;
    position: relative;
    top: 50%;
}

.animation-label {
    padding: 5px;
    padding-right: 5px;
    padding-left: 5px;
    border: solid 1px #656565;
    background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9);
    -webkit-box-shadow:  1px 1px 1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    box-shadow:  1px 1px 1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    border-radius:6px;
    color: #000000;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-family: Verdana;
    text-align: center;
    background-position: center;
}

/*-------------- standard button --------------*/.ic_button_standard {
                                                     display: table;
                                                     background-color:#f2f2f2;
                                                     border: 1px solid #8e8e8e;
                                                     border-radius: 4px;
                                                     background-image: none;
                                                     padding: 5px;
                                                     text-align: center;
                                                     color: #6B6B6B;
                                                     /* background: #fafafa;
 */ /* Old browsers */	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #fafafa 20%, #dcdcdc 45%, #c8c8c8 51%, #f0f0f0 90%);
                                                     /* FF3.6+ */	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(20%, #fafafa), color-stop(45%, #dcdcdc), color-stop(51%, #c8c8c8), color-stop(90%, #f0f0f0));
                                                     /* Chrome,Safari4+ */	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #fafafa 20%, #dcdcdc 45%, #c8c8c8 51%, #f0f0f0 90%);
                                                     /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #fafafa 20%, #dcdcdc 45%, #c8c8c8 51%, #f0f0f0 90%);
                                                     /* Opera 11.10+ */	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #fafafa 20%, #dcdcdc 45%, #c8c8c8 51%, #f0f0f0 90%);
                                                     /* IE10+ */	background: linear-gradient(top, #fafafa 20%, #dcdcdc 45%, #c8c8c8 51%, #f0f0f0 90%);
                                                     /* W3C */	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#fafafa', endColorstr='#c8c8c8', GradientType=0 );
                                                     /* IE6-9 */}

.ic_button_standard div.html-face {
    display: table-cell;
    vertical-align: middle;
    height: auto !important;
}

.ic_button_standard-up-hovering {
    display: table;
    background-color:#8b8b8b;
    border: 1px solid #606060;
    border-radius: 4px;
    background-image: none;
    padding: 5px;
    text-shadow: 0px 1px 2px #000000;
    filter: dropshadow(color=#000000, offx=0, offy=1);
    text-align: center;
    color: #ffffff;
    background: #d9d9d9;
    /* Old browsers */	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #d9d9d9 20%, #aaaaaa 45%, #a0a0a0 51%, #dcdcdc 90%);
    /* FF3.6+ */	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(20%, #d9d9d9), color-stop(45%, #aaaaaa), color-stop(51%, #a0a0a0), color-stop(90%, #dcdcdc));
    /* Chrome,Safari4+ */	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #d9d9d9 20%, #aaaaaa 45%, #a0a0a0 51%, #dcdcdc 90%);
    /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #d9d9d9 20%, #aaaaaa 45%, #a0a0a0 51%, #dcdcdc 90%);
    /* Opera 11.10+ */	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #d9d9d9 20%, #aaaaaa 45%, #a0a0a0 51%, #dcdcdc 90%);
    /* IE10+ */	background: linear-gradient(top, #d9d9d9 20%, #aaaaaa 45%, #a0a0a0 51%, #dcdcdc 90%);
    /* W3C */	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#d9d9d9', endColorstr='#a0a0a0', GradientType=0 );
    /* IE6-9 */}

.ic_button_standard-down-hovering {
    display: table;
    background-color:#2956a3;
    border: 1px solid #06A4E2;
    border-radius: 4px;
    background-image: none;
    padding: 5px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #026387;
    background: #ebf1f6;
    /* Old browsers */	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #ebf1f6 20%, #abd3ee 45%, #89c3eb 51%, #d5ebfb 90%);
    /* FF3.6+ */	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(20%, #ebf1f6), color-stop(45%, #abd3ee), color-stop(51%, #89c3eb), color-stop(90%, #d5ebfb));
    /* Chrome,Safari4+ */	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #ebf1f6 20%, #abd3ee 45%, #89c3eb 51%, #d5ebfb 90%);
    /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #ebf1f6 20%, #abd3ee 45%, #89c3eb 51%, #d5ebfb 90%);
    /* Opera 11.10+ */	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #ebf1f6 20%, #abd3ee 45%, #89c3eb 51%, #d5ebfb 90%);
    /* IE10+ */	background: linear-gradient(top, #ebf1f6 20%, #abd3ee 45%, #89c3eb 51%, #d5ebfb 90%);
    /* W3C */	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#ebf1f6', endColorstr='#89c3eb', GradientType=0 );
    /* IE6-9 */}

/*--- Standard Button Transparent ---*/.Button_transparent {
                                       }

..Button_transparent .ic_button_standard, ..Button_transparent .ic_button_standard-up-hovering, ..Button_transparent .ic_button_standard-down-hovering {
    display: table-cell;
    vertical-align: middle;
    background-color:transparent;
    border: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
    background-image: none;
    padding: 0;
    text-align: center;
    color: #6B6B6B;
    background: none;
    filter: none;
}

/*---------------------------- single state button ----------------------------*/.singlestate-button-wrapper {
                                                                                     padding: 0 !important;
                                                                                     margin: 0 !important;
                                                                                     display: table;
                                                                                     -webkit-border-radius: 4px;

.selectable-element-wrapper {
    border: 0 !important;
    margin: 1px;
}

.selectable-element {
    cursor: pointer !important;
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #555555;
    font-family: Georgia;
    display: block;
    padding: 0 !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
    -webkit-box-shadow: inset -2px -2px 3px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    box-shadow: inset -2px -2px 3px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    border-top: 1px solid #cccccc;
    border-right: 0px solid #cccccc;
    border-bottom: 0px solid #cccccc;
    border-left: 1px solid #cccccc;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    background: #f8fbfe;
    /* Old browsers */		background: -moz-linear-gradient(-45deg, #f8fbfe 0%, #ecf5fc 12%, #d9ecfd 50%, #e7f2fb 89%, #eef5fc 100%);
    /* FF3.6+ */		background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right bottom, color-stop(0%, #f8fbfe), color-stop(12%, #ecf5fc), color-stop(50%, #d9ecfd), color-stop(89%, #e7f2fb), color-stop(100%, #eef5fc));
    /* Chrome,Safari4+ */		background: -webkit-linear-gradient(-45deg, #f8fbfe 0%, #ecf5fc 12%, #d9ecfd 50%, #e7f2fb 89%, #eef5fc 100%);
    /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */		background: -o-linear-gradient(-45deg, #f8fbfe 0%, #ecf5fc 12%, #d9ecfd 50%, #e7f2fb 89%, #eef5fc 100%);
    /* Opera 11.10+ */		background: -ms-linear-gradient(-45deg, #f8fbfe 0%, #ecf5fc 12%, #d9ecfd 50%, #e7f2fb 89%, #eef5fc 100%);
    /* IE10+ */		background: linear-gradient(-45deg, #f8fbfe 0%, #ecf5fc 12%, #d9ecfd 50%, #e7f2fb 89%, #eef5fc 100%);
    /* W3C */		filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#f8fbfe', endColorstr='#eef5fc', GradientType=1 );
    /* IE6-9 fallback on horizontal gradient */	}

.selectable-element:hover {
    color: #333333;
    background: #d3e9ff;
    /* Old browsers */		background: -moz-linear-gradient(-45deg, #d3e9ff 0%, #c7e7ff 12%, #b7ddff 50%, #c1e3ff 89%, #c9e4ff 100%);
    /* FF3.6+ */		background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right bottom, color-stop(0%, #d3e9ff), color-stop(12%, #c7e7ff), color-stop(50%, #b7ddff), color-stop(89%, #c1e3ff), color-stop(100%, #c9e4ff));
    /* Chrome,Safari4+ */		background: -webkit-linear-gradient(-45deg, #d3e9ff 0%, #c7e7ff 12%, #b7ddff 50%, #c1e3ff 89%, #c9e4ff 100%);
    /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */		background: -o-linear-gradient(-45deg, #d3e9ff 0%, #c7e7ff 12%, #b7ddff 50%, #c1e3ff 89%, #c9e4ff 100%);
    /* Opera 11.10+ */		background: -ms-linear-gradient(-45deg, #d3e9ff 0%, #c7e7ff 12%, #b7ddff 50%, #c1e3ff 89%, #c9e4ff 100%);
    /* IE10+ */		background: linear-gradient(-45deg, #d3e9ff 0%, #c7e7ff 12%, #b7ddff 50%, #c1e3ff 89%, #c9e4ff 100%);
    /* W3C */		filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#d3e9ff', endColorstr='#c9e4ff', GradientType=1 );
    /* IE6-9 fallback on horizontal gradient */	}

.selectable-element-selected, .selectable-element-selected:hover {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #ffffff;
    background: #73b1e7;
    /* Old browsers */		background: -moz-linear-gradient(-45deg, #73b1e7 14%, #0a77d5 86%);
    /* FF3.6+ */		background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right bottom, color-stop(14%, #73b1e7), color-stop(86%, #0a77d5));
    /* Chrome,Safari4+ */		background: -webkit-linear-gradient(-45deg, #73b1e7 14%, #0a77d5 86%);
    /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */		background: -o-linear-gradient(-45deg, #73b1e7 14%, #0a77d5 86%);
    /* Opera 11.10+ */		background: -ms-linear-gradient(-45deg, #73b1e7 14%, #0a77d5 86%);
    /* IE10+ */		background: linear-gradient(-45deg, #73b1e7 14%, #0a77d5 86%);
    /* W3C */		filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#73b1e7', endColorstr='#0a77d5', GradientType=1 );
    /* IE6-9 fallback on horizontal gradient */				text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px #000000;
    filter: dropshadow(color=#000000, offx=1, offy=1);
}

.selectable-element-selected-correct {
    color: #ffffff;
    background: #9ae773;
    /* Old browsers */		background: -moz-linear-gradient(-45deg, #9ae773 14%, #4ed60a 86%);

/* TABLES */	.Table {
                    border-collapse:collapse;
                    color: #717171;
                    border: 0;
                    border-radius: 5px;
                    border:1px solid #d3d3d3;
                    background:#fefefe;
                    -moz-border-radius:5px;
                    /* FF1+ */		-webkit-border-radius:5px;
                    /* Saf3-4 */	border-radius:5px;
                    -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
                    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
                }

.Table td {
    border: 1px solid #e1e1e1 !important;
    border-left: 0 !important;
    -webkit-text-size-adjust:100% !important;
}

.Table .row_1 {
    border-top: 0 !important;
}

.Table tr:last-child td {

/* WRITING CALCULATIONS */	.WritingCalculations {
                                  background-color: #fafafa;
                                  border: 0;
                                  border-radius: 5px;
                                  padding: 40px;
                              }

.WritingCalculations #writing-calculations-wrapper {
    margin: auto;
}

.WritingCalculations .container-line {
    border-bottom: 1px solid darkgrey !important;
}

.WritingCalculations .wrapper-row {
    margin: 3px 0 3px 0;
    background-color: none;
}

.WritingCalculations .wrapper-cell {
    font-size: 17px;
    color: #717171;
    font-family: Verdana;
    line-height:24px;
}

.WritingCalculations .writing-calculations-input {
    border: 1px solid #B0BDD2;
    border-radius: 5px;
    padding-left: 2px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 17px;
    height: 24px;
    margin-left: 10px;
}

.WritingCalculations .dot {
    position: absolute;
}

.WritingCalculations .correct {
    background-image: none;
    background-color: #44dd00 !important;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-shadow: 0px 1px 2px #000000;
    filter: dropshadow(color=#000000, offx=0, offy=1);
    padding-left: 2px !important;
}

.WritingCalculations .incorrect {
    background-image: none;
    background-color: red !important;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-shadow: 0px 1px 2px #000000;
    filter: dropshadow(color=#000000, offx=0, offy=1);
    padding-left: 2px !important;
}

.text_paragraph_calculations {
    font-size: 17px;
    color: #717171;
    font-family: Verdana;
    padding: 0;
    line-height: 24px;
}

.text_paragraph_calculations input {
    display: inline;
    font-size: 17px;
    height: 24px;
    width: 27px;
    padding: 0px;
    margin: 0 5px 0 5px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

.text_paragraph_calculations input.ic_inlineChoice-correct {
    background-color: #44dd00 !important;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-shadow: 0px 1px 2px #000000;
    filter: dropshadow(color=#000000, offx=0, offy=1);
}

.text_paragraph_calculations input.ic_inlineChoice-wrong {
    background-color: red !important;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-shadow: 0px 1px 2px #000000;
    filter: dropshadow(color=#000000, offx=0, offy=1);
}

/*-------------- PLOT --------------*/.plotAddon {
                                          border: 1px solid #b0bdd2;
                                          padding: 10px;
                                          color: #717171;
                                      }

.plotAddon .canvas {
    background: transparent !important;
}

.plotAddon .draw {
    stroke: #06A4E2;
}

.plotAddon .draw_over, .plotAddon .draw_1_over, .plotAddon .draw_2_over, .plotAddon .draw_3_over, .plotAddon .draw_4_over, .plotAddon .draw_5_over, .plotAddon .draw_6_over, .plotAddon .draw_7_over, .plotAddon .draw_8_over {
    stroke: #888888 !important;
}

.plotAddon .draw_selected, .plotAddon .draw_1_selected, .plotAddon .draw_2_selected, .plotAddon .draw_3_selected, .plotAddon .draw_4_selected, .plotAddon .draw_5_selected {
    stroke: #888888 !important;
}

.plotAddon .draw_1 {
    stroke: #06A4E2;
}

.plotAddon .draw_2 {
    stroke: #E862E2;
}

.plotAddon .draw_3 {
    stroke: #815DE2;
}

.plotAddon .draw_4 {
    stroke: #FFB600;
}

.plotAddon .draw_5 {
    stroke: #55E5D7;
}

.plotAddon .draw_6 {
    stroke: #BA4AB0;
}

.plotAddon .draw_7 {
    stroke: #6B86DD;
}

.plotAddon .draw_8 {
    stroke: #FF8533;
}

.plotAddon .point {
}

.plotAddon .point_over {
    fill: #66C6E2;
    stroke: #66C6E2;
}

.plotAddon .point_selected {
    fill: #06A4E2;
    stroke: #66C6E2;
}

.plotAddon .point_outline {
    fill: #66C6E2;
    stroke: #06A4E2;
}

.plotAddon .point_error {
    fill: #F00200;
    stroke: #FF8A8A;
}

.plotAddon .point_outline_mark_error {
    fill: #FF8A8A;
    stroke: #F00200;
}

.plotAddon .point_correct {
    fill: #299a0b;
    stroke: #64C151;
}

.plotAddon .point_outline_mark_correct {
    fill: #64C151;
    stroke: #299a0b;
}

.plotAddon .draw_mark_correct {
    stroke: #299a0b !important;
}

.plotAddon .draw_mark_error {
    stroke: red !important;
}

/*--- animation ---*/.animationFrame {
                         border: 1px solid #CCCCCC;
                         padding: 2px;
                         background-color: transparent;
                     }

.animationFrame .animation-watermark {
    display: block;
    height: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%;
}

.animationFrame .animation-watermark canvas {
    display: inline;
    height: 100px;
    width: 100px;
    margin-top: -50px;
    position: relative;
    top: 50%;
}

/*--- animation small---*/	.animationFrame-small {
                                  border: 1px solid #CCCCCC;
                                  padding: 2px;
                                  background-color: #ffffff;
                              }

.animationFrame-small .animation-watermark {
    display: block;
    height: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%;
}

.animationFrame-small .animation-watermark canvas {
    display: inline;
    height: 40px;
    width: 40px;
    margin-top: -20px !important;
    position: relative;
    top: 50%;
}

/*--- animation empty---*/			.animation_empty {
                                          cursor: pointer;
                                          background-color: transparent;
                                          padding: 0 !important;
                                          border: 0 !important;
                                      }

.animation_empty .animation-watermark {
    height: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%;
}

.animation_empty .animation-watermark canvas {
    display: inline;
    height: 100px;
    width: 100px;
    margin-top: -50px;
    position: relative;
    top: 50%;
}

.animation-label {
    padding: 5px;
    padding-right: 5px;
    padding-left: 5px;
    border: solid 1px #656565;
    background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9);
    -webkit-box-shadow:  1px 1px 1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    box-shadow:  1px 1px 1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    border-radius:6px;
    color: #000000;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-family: Verdana;
    text-align: center;
    background-position: center;
}

/*-------------- standard button --------------*/.ic_button_standard {
                                                     display: table;
                                                     background-color:#f2f2f2;
                                                     border: 1px solid #8e8e8e;
                                                     border-radius: 4px;
                                                     background-image: none;
                                                     padding: 5px;
                                                     text-align: center;
                                                     color: #6B6B6B;
                                                     /* background: #fafafa;
 */ /* Old browsers */	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #fafafa 20%, #dcdcdc 45%, #c8c8c8 51%, #f0f0f0 90%);
                                                     /* FF3.6+ */	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(20%, #fafafa), color-stop(45%, #dcdcdc), color-stop(51%, #c8c8c8), color-stop(90%, #f0f0f0));
                                                     /* Chrome,Safari4+ */	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #fafafa 20%, #dcdcdc 45%, #c8c8c8 51%, #f0f0f0 90%);
                                                     /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #fafafa 20%, #dcdcdc 45%, #c8c8c8 51%, #f0f0f0 90%);
                                                     /* Opera 11.10+ */	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #fafafa 20%, #dcdcdc 45%, #c8c8c8 51%, #f0f0f0 90%);
                                                     /* IE10+ */	background: linear-gradient(top, #fafafa 20%, #dcdcdc 45%, #c8c8c8 51%, #f0f0f0 90%);
                                                     /* W3C */	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#fafafa', endColorstr='#c8c8c8', GradientType=0 );
                                                     /* IE6-9 */}

.ic_button_standard div.html-face {
    display: table-cell;
    vertical-align: middle;
    height: auto !important;
}

.ic_button_standard-up-hovering {
    display: table;
    background-color:#8b8b8b;
    border: 1px solid #606060;
    border-radius: 4px;
    background-image: none;
    padding: 5px;
    text-shadow: 0px 1px 2px #000000;
    filter: dropshadow(color=#000000, offx=0, offy=1);
    text-align: center;
    color: #ffffff;
    background: #d9d9d9;
    /* Old browsers */	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #d9d9d9 20%, #aaaaaa 45%, #a0a0a0 51%, #dcdcdc 90%);
    /* FF3.6+ */	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(20%, #d9d9d9), color-stop(45%, #aaaaaa), color-stop(51%, #a0a0a0), color-stop(90%, #dcdcdc));
    /* Chrome,Safari4+ */	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #d9d9d9 20%, #aaaaaa 45%, #a0a0a0 51%, #dcdcdc 90%);
    /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #d9d9d9 20%, #aaaaaa 45%, #a0a0a0 51%, #dcdcdc 90%);
    /* Opera 11.10+ */	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #d9d9d9 20%, #aaaaaa 45%, #a0a0a0 51%, #dcdcdc 90%);
    /* IE10+ */	background: linear-gradient(top, #d9d9d9 20%, #aaaaaa 45%, #a0a0a0 51%, #dcdcdc 90%);
    /* W3C */	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#d9d9d9', endColorstr='#a0a0a0', GradientType=0 );
    /* IE6-9 */}

.ic_button_standard-down-hovering {
    display: table;
    background-color:#2956a3;
    border: 1px solid #06A4E2;
    border-radius: 4px;
    background-image: none;
    padding: 5px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #026387;
    background: #ebf1f6;
    /* Old browsers */	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #ebf1f6 20%, #abd3ee 45%, #89c3eb 51%, #d5ebfb 90%);
    /* FF3.6+ */	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(20%, #ebf1f6), color-stop(45%, #abd3ee), color-stop(51%, #89c3eb), color-stop(90%, #d5ebfb));
    /* Chrome,Safari4+ */	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #ebf1f6 20%, #abd3ee 45%, #89c3eb 51%, #d5ebfb 90%);
    /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */	background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #ebf1f6 20%, #abd3ee 45%, #89c3eb 51%, #d5ebfb 90%);
    /* Opera 11.10+ */	background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #ebf1f6 20%, #abd3ee 45%, #89c3eb 51%, #d5ebfb 90%);
    /* IE10+ */	background: linear-gradient(top, #ebf1f6 20%, #abd3ee 45%, #89c3eb 51%, #d5ebfb 90%);
    /* W3C */	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#ebf1f6', endColorstr='#89c3eb', GradientType=0 );
    /* IE6-9 */}

/*--- Standard Button Transparent ---*/.Button_transparent {
                                       }

..Button_transparent .ic_button_standard, ..Button_transparent .ic_button_standard-up-hovering, ..Button_transparent .ic_button_standard-down-hovering {
    display: table-cell;
    vertical-align: middle;
    background-color:transparent;
    border: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
    background-image: none;
    padding: 0;
    text-align: center;
    color: #6B6B6B;
    background: none;
    filter: none;
}

/*---------------------------- single state button ----------------------------*/.singlestate-button-wrapper {
                                                                                     padding: 0 !important;
                                                                                     margin: 0 !important;
                                                                                     display: table;
                                                                                     -webkit-border-radius: 4px;
                                                                                     border-radius: 4px;
                                                                                     overflow: hidden !important;
                                                                                     filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#fafafa', endColorstr='#c8c8c8', GradientType=0 );
                                                                                     position: relative;
                                                                                     border: 1px solid #8e8e8e;
                                                                                 }

.singlestate-button-element, .singlestate-button-element.disable:hover {
    display: table-cell;
    height: auto !important;

    background-color:#f2f2f2;

    padding: 5px 5px 5px 5px;

/*--- text identification ---*/.addon_text_identification {
                                   padding: 0 !important;
                                   margin: 0 !important;
                               }

.text-identification-container {
    display: table-cell;
    vertical-align: middle;
    height: 100%;
    border: 1px solid #c9c9c9;
    border-radius: 5px;
    padding: 0 8px 0 8px !important;
    height: 22px;
    text-align:center;
    background-color: #e1c6f8;
    font-size: 17px;
    color: #555555;
    margin: 0;
    -webkit-box-shadow:  1px 1px 1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    box-shadow:  1px 1px 1px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    background: #eaeaea;
    /* Old browsers */		background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #eaeaea 0%, #d8d8d8 49%, #cdcdcd 55%, #c9c9c9 100%);
    /* FF3.6+ */		background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #eaeaea), color-stop(49%, #d8d8d8), color-stop(55%, #cdcdcd), color-stop(100%, #c9c9c9));
    /* Chrome,Safari4+ */		background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #eaeaea 0%, #d8d8d8 49%, #cdcdcd 55%, #c9c9c9 100%);
    /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */		background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #eaeaea 0%, #d8d8d8 49%, #cdcdcd 55%, #c9c9c9 100%);
    /* Opera 11.10+ */		background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #eaeaea 0%, #d8d8d8 49%, #cdcdcd 55%, #c9c9c9 100%);
    /* IE10+ */		background: linear-gradient(top, #eaeaea 0%, #d8d8d8 49%, #cdcdcd 55%, #c9c9c9 100%);

    color: #662222;
    border: 1px solid #fe8a80;

/* TABLES */	.Table {
                    border-collapse:collapse;
                    color: #717171;
                    border: 0;
                    border-radius: 5px;
                    border:1px solid #d3d3d3;
                    background:#fefefe;
                    -moz-border-radius:5px;
                    /* FF1+ */		-webkit-border-radius:5px;
                    /* Saf3-4 */	border-radius:5px;
                    -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
                    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
                }

.Table td {
    border: 1px solid #e1e1e1 !important;
    border-left: 0 !important;
    -webkit-text-size-adjust:100% !important;
}

.Table .row_1 {
    border-top: 0 !important;
}

.Table tr:last-child td {
    border-radius: 0 0 5px 5px;
    border-bottom: 0 !important;
    border-left: 0 !important;
}

.Table tr td:last-child {
    border-radius: 0 5px 0 0;
    border-right: 0 !important;
}

/* WRITING CALCULATIONS */	.WritingCalculations {
                                  background-color: #fafafa;
                                  border: 0;
                                  border-radius: 5px;
                                  padding: 40px;
                              }

.WritingCalculations #writing-calculations-wrapper {
    margin: auto;
}

.WritingCalculations .container-line {
    border-bottom: 1px solid darkgrey !important;
}

.WritingCalculations .wrapper-row {
    margin: 3px 0 3px 0;
    background-color: none;
}

.WritingCalculations .wrapper-cell {
    font-size: 17px;
    color: #717171;
    font-family: Verdana;
    line-height:24px;
}

.WritingCalculations .writing-calculations-input {
    border: 1px solid #B0BDD2;
    border-radius: 5px;
    padding-left: 2px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 17px;
    height: 24px;
    margin-left: 10px;
}

.WritingCalculations .dot {
    position: absolute;
}

.WritingCalculations .correct {
    background-image: none;
    background-color: #44dd00 !important;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-shadow: 0px 1px 2px #000000;
    filter: dropshadow(color=#000000, offx=0, offy=1);
    padding-left: 2px !important;
}

.WritingCalculations .incorrect {
    background-image: none;
    background-color: red !important;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-shadow: 0px 1px 2px #000000;
    filter: dropshadow(color=#000000, offx=0, offy=1);
    padding-left: 2px !important;
}

.text_paragraph_calculations {
    font-size: 17px;
    color: #717171;
    font-family: Verdana;
    padding: 0;
    line-height: 24px;
}

.text_paragraph_calculations input {
    display: inline;
    font-size: 17px;
    height: 24px;
    width: 27px;
    padding: 0px;
    margin: 0 5px 0 5px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

.text_paragraph_calculations input.ic_inlineChoice-correct {
    background-color: #44dd00 !important;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-shadow: 0px 1px 2px #000000;
    filter: dropshadow(color=#000000, offx=0, offy=1);
}

.text_paragraph_calculations input.ic_inlineChoice-wrong {
    background-color: red !important;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-shadow: 0px 1px 2px #000000;
    filter: dropshadow(color=#000000, offx=0, offy=1);
}

/*-------------- PLOT --------------*/.plotAddon {
                                          border: 1px solid #b0bdd2;
                                          padding: 10px;
                                          color: #717171;
                                      }

.plotAddon .canvas {
    background: transparent !important;
}

.plotAddon .draw {
    stroke: #06A4E2;
}

.plotAddon .draw_over, .plotAddon .draw_1_over, .plotAddon .draw_2_over, .plotAddon .draw_3_over, .plotAddon .draw_4_over, .plotAddon .draw_5_over, .plotAddon .draw_6_over, .plotAddon .draw_7_over, .plotAddon .draw_8_over {
    stroke: #888888 !important;
}

.plotAddon .draw_selected, .plotAddon .draw_1_selected, .plotAddon .draw_2_selected, .plotAddon .draw_3_selected, .plotAddon .draw_4_selected, .plotAddon .draw_5_selected {
    stroke: #888888 !important;
}

.plotAddon .draw_1 {
    stroke: #06A4E2;
}

.plotAddon .draw_2 {
    stroke: #E862E2;
}

.plotAddon .draw_3 {
    stroke: #815DE2;
}

.plotAddon .draw_4 {
    stroke: #FFB600;
}

.plotAddon .draw_5 {
    stroke: #55E5D7;
}

.plotAddon .draw_6 {
    stroke: #BA4AB0;
}

.plotAddon .draw_7 {
    stroke: #6B86DD;
}

.plotAddon .draw_8 {
    stroke: #FF8533;
}

.plotAddon .point {
}

.plotAddon .point_over {
    fill: #66C6E2;
    stroke: #66C6E2;
}

.plotAddon .point_selected {
    fill: #06A4E2;
    stroke: #66C6E2;
}

.plotAddon .point_outline {
    fill: #66C6E2;
    stroke: #06A4E2;
}

.plotAddon .point_error {
    fill: #F00200;
    stroke: #FF8A8A;
}

.plotAddon .point_outline_mark_error {
    fill: #FF8A8A;
    stroke: #F00200;
}

.plotAddon .point_correct {
    fill: #299a0b;
    stroke: #64C151;
}

.plotAddon .point_outline_mark_correct {
    fill: #64C151;
    stroke: #299a0b;
}

.plotAddon .draw_mark_correct {
    stroke: #299a0b !important;
}

.plotAddon .draw_mark_error {
    stroke: red !important;
}

.ic_gap-empty:disabled {

}

.ic_gap:disabled {
    background: url('/file/serve/9234') #FCFCFC right 1px;
;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

.ic_draggableGapEmpty-empty {
    border-color: #B7B7B7 !important;
    background: url('/file/serve/9234') 0px 1px #FCFCFC !important;
    background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
}

.ic_draggableGapEmpty-disabled {
    border-color: #B7B7B7 !important;
    background: url('/file/serve/9234') 0px 1px #FCFCFC !important;
    background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
}

select:disabled {
    border-color: #B7B7B7 !important;
    background: url('/file/serve/9234') #FCFCFC 0px -1px;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

input:disabled {
    border-color: #B7B7B7 !important;
    background: url('/file/serve/9234') #FCFCFC;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    opacity: 1.0;
    color: darkgrey;
}

.multiplegap_inactive {

    background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
}

/*-------------- GRAPHS ------------*/.graph_value_element {
                                          border: none;
                                          top: 0;
                                          left: 0;
                                          bottom: 0;
                                          right: 0;
                                          border-radius: 5px;
                                          margin: 0 3px;
                                      }

.graph_value_element_positive_invalid {
    border: none;
    background: #cf0404;
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, #cf0404 0%, #ff3019 100%);
    background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, color-stop(0%, #cf0404), color-stop(100%, #ff3019));
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, #cf0404 0%, #ff3019 100%);
    background: -o-linear-gradient(left, #cf0404 0%, #ff3019 100%);
    background: -ms-linear-gradient(left, #cf0404 0%, #ff3019 100%);
    background: linear-gradient(to right, #cf0404 0%, #ff3019 100%);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#cf0404', endColorstr='#ff3019', GradientType=1 );
}

.graph_value_element_positive_valid {
    background: #43ab03;
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, #43ab03 0%, #41e600 100%);
    background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, color-stop(0%, #43ab03), color-stop(100%, #41e600));
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, #43ab03 0%, #41e600 100%);
    background: -o-linear-gradient(left, #43ab03 0%, #41e600 100%);
    background: -ms-linear-gradient(left, #43ab03 0%, #41e600 100%);
    background: linear-gradient(to right, #43ab03 0%, #41e600 100%);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#43ab03', endColorstr='#41e600', GradientType=1 );
}

    background: grey;
}

}

.graph_axis_x_line {
    height: 1px;
}

}

}
